query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    name as "name: KrateName",
                    version as "version: Version",
                    priority,
                    registry,
                    attempt
                 FROM queue
                 WHERE
                    attempt < $1 AND
                    (last_attempt IS NULL OR last_attempt < NOW() - make_interval(secs => $2))
                 ORDER BY priority ASC, attempt ASC, id ASC
                 LIMIT 1
                 FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED
